title: What's the best way to become a good writer? - Writing & Blogging - Quora

response.answer_text: I hate to say it because it’ll sound so cliché, but the best way to become a good writer is to (1) read a lot of good writing and (2) write and write and write a lot. ‘Good writing’ is hard to find on the internet. I would suggest reading lots of books: for fiction read the most popular fiction novels from well-known writers; for nonfiction start by reading some of the best essays and letters written by famous authors. This advice holds true for beginning bloggers as well: learn from the best first (in books), then look to popular bloggers.
